title: Share.
description:
VALUE: Definition of the share with required and optional parameters. 
 KEY: String that specifies the identifier (i.e. name) for the share; must be unique in the account and inline with the naming convention for shares. 
 -------- 
 Naming Convention: 
 SHARE_<Database_Name>

database_name.title:
Optional parameter 
 -> Usage privilege on a Snowflake database granted to the share.

accounts.title:
Optional parameter 
 -> List that specifies the account(s) with which the share is shared

comment.title:
Optional parameter 
 -> String (literal) which specifies a comment for the share.
